N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7356.2 - Definite sentence calculation

State Regulations
(a) Whenever a good behavior allowance is granted, withheld, forfeited, canceled or
restored, in whole or in part, the director, or designee, shall provide the
sheriff a copy of the updated facility record maintained pursuant to section
7356.1
of this Part. (b) Upon the sentence of a youth to serve a
definite sentence of imprisonment in a facility, the sheriff, or sheriff's
designee, shall establish the youth's date of discharge by crediting the amount
of jail time to which youth is entitled pursuant to section
70.30
of the Penal

Law, and any good behavior allowances granted by a facility pursuant to this

Part. (c) After establishing a date
of discharge pursuant to subdivision (b) of this section, or after any
amendment of such date of discharge, the sheriff shall provide written
notification to the director. Upon receipt, the director shall provide such
written notification to the youth. Notes
